mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach ( atch_no, atch_notice_no, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path ) VALUES ( seq_attach.NEXTVAL, #{atchNoticeNo}, #{atchFileName}, #{atchOriginalName}, #{atchFileSize}, #{atchFancySize}, #{atchContentType}, #{atchPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT atch_no , atch_notice_no , atch_file_name , atch_original_name , atch_file_size , atch_fancy_size , atch_content_type , atch_path FROM attach WHERE atch_notice_no = #{atchNoticeNo}
